title: The Magic of Migration
description: The Magic of Migration discusses some of the many creatures that migrate. The book explains how, when, where, and why migration takes place. Photos, maps, and a diagram support the text.
meta: drought, magnetic, migration, navigate, spawn, wildebeests
Use the reading strategy of asking and answering questions
Cause and Effect : Identify the cause and effect of events
Bold Print : Recognize and understand the use of bold print
Suffixes : Identify the suffix -ion in text

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
